column1: #text=Every Sunday , I love to bake cake for a family dessert .
#text=But before I bake my cake , I make sure I go to the supermarket to get all of my ingredients .
#text=My ingredients include baking powder , milk , eggs , sugar , and the list continues .
#text=Once I purchase all of my ingredients , I go home and get my electric appliances such as mixer and other tools ready to use .
#text=It 's usually very fun to bake a cake because I bake with my sister .
#text=We always make a mess in the kitchen and always laugh about it .
#text=Whether it 's baking powder all over our clothes , or broken eggs on the floor , we make a big mess .
#text=But at the end , we get everything right and actually bake a decent cake .
#text=We tend to bake vanilla or red velvet cake .
#text=Once the cake is ready , we wait an hour until we put icing on top of the cake .
#text=Later on after dinner , the family enjoys a nice slice of cake .
